project.name: div2js
project.description: A DIV2 Game Studio compiler to JavaScript

classitems.description:
runtime namespace is the core component of DIV2js. It handles the game loop
and process management.

Start a new DIV2js environment by creating the root process.
The root process has `id` set to `0` and no parent.
TODO: Provide a deeper description of the root process.
